title: Russia closes in on Donetsk city despite Ukraine’s successes elsewhere
content: Hopes that Ukraine’s incursion into Russia would relieve pressure on the eastern front are not being realized as Moscow’s forces approach Pokrovsk.
summary: Hopes that Ukraine’s incursion into Russia would relieve pressure on the eastern front are not being realized as Moscow’s forces approach Pokrovsk.

title: Hamas claims Tel Aviv attack as Blinken promotes cease-fire in Israel
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken, who met with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, called the U.S.-backed proposal “maybe the last” chance to secure hostages and bring lasting security.
summary: Secretary of State Antony Blinken, who met with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, called the U.S.-backed proposal “maybe the last” chance to secure hostages and bring lasting security.

title: Chinese and Philippine ships collide at Sabina Shoal, a new flash point
content: The incident, the first time in decades that Beijing and Manila have clashed over the Sabina Shoal, may derail efforts to lower tensions in the South China Sea.
summary: The incident, the first time in decades that Beijing and Manila have clashed over the Sabina Shoal, may derail efforts to lower tensions in the South China Sea.

title: In Ukraine-controlled Sudzha, stranded Russian civilians question what’s next
content: For Ukrainian forces on the ground, the offensive is seen less as a conquest for long-term annexation and more as a negotiating tactic.
summary: For Ukrainian forces on the ground, the offensive is seen less as a conquest for long-term annexation and more as a negotiating tactic.

title: Blinken arrives in Israel to push cease-fire deal amid doubts of success
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken is in Israel for a trip focused on bridging the gaps between Israel and Hamas on a U.S.-sponsored cease-fire proposal.
summary: Secretary of State Antony Blinken is in Israel for a trip focused on bridging the gaps between Israel and Hamas on a U.S.-sponsored cease-fire proposal.

title: Kremlin response to Kursk incursion shows how Putin freezes in a crisis
content: When Russian President Vladimir Putin’s authority is tested, his response often lacks quick, decisive action that lives up to his bellicose rhetoric.
summary: When Russian President Vladimir Putin’s authority is tested, his response often lacks quick, decisive action that lives up to his bellicose rhetoric.

title: Venezuelans stage global protests, seek recognition of election victory
content: In Venezuela and cities around the world, protesters carried vote tally receipts collected by the opposition showing that their candidate won more votes.
summary: In Venezuela and cities around the world, protesters carried vote tally receipts collected by the opposition showing that their candidate won more votes.

title: Gaza faces public health crisis with first confirmed case of polio
content: The United Nations is now pushing for a pause in the fighting so it can coordinate two mass vaccination campaigns for more than 640,000 children.
summary: The United Nations is now pushing for a pause in the fighting so it can coordinate two mass vaccination campaigns for more than 640,000 children.

title: X closes operations in Brazil, blames judge’s ‘censorship’ orders
content: The social media platform and owner Elon Musk have been feuding with Brazilian Justice Alexandre de Moraes for months.
summary: The social media platform and owner Elon Musk have been feuding with Brazilian Justice Alexandre de Moraes for months.

title: Why Indonesia moved its capital to a jungle hundreds of miles away
content: The new city, Nusantara, comes as Jakarta continues to sink at a record pace.
summary: The new city, Nusantara, comes as Jakarta continues to sink at a record pace.

title: Israeli strikes in Gaza and Lebanon kill at least 25, officials say
content: Saturday’s bloodshed came after the United States and its allies expressed optimism over cease-fire negotiations to end the war in Gaza.
summary: Saturday’s bloodshed came after the United States and its allies expressed optimism over cease-fire negotiations to end the war in Gaza.

title: Jared Kushner wants to turn a wild stretch of Albania into a luxury resort
content: Kushner’s use of foreign funds is again coming under scrutiny. Environmentalists fear his planned resort could destroy a delicate ecosystem.
summary: Kushner’s use of foreign funds is again coming under scrutiny. Environmentalists fear his planned resort could destroy a delicate ecosystem.

title: What to know about Indian protests over a student doctor’s rape and killing
content: Indian doctors have called a 24-hour strike following the rape and killing of a female trainee doctor in Kolkata and protests have swept major cities this week.
summary: Indian doctors have called a 24-hour strike following the rape and killing of a female trainee doctor in Kolkata and protests have swept major cities this week.
